t: Odisha Artisans Found National Market | Seller Success
s: Odisha handicraft artisans find a sustainable way of doing business by selling their product on Amazon. They don't have to think of an alternate profession anymore due to diminishing demand of these products locally in Odisha. They can now sell across the whole country.

t: Amazon launched a program for Indian handicrafts. Local artisans say it’s not working
s: December 6, 2024 - Amazon launched its Karigar program in 2017 to promote Indian handicrafts, but Kutch artisans say its mass-market approach undervalues their goods.
